title: Synchronous REST API with Lambda SnapStart
description: This pattern demonstrates how to create a synchronous REST API using API Gateway, AWS Lambda and DynamoDB.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern is built using [Spring Boot 3](https://spring.io/projects/spring-boot) and leverages the [AWS Serverless Java Container](https://github.com/awslabs/aws-serverless-java-container) for seamless integration with AWS Lambda.
This pattern also demonstrates the usage of [SnapStart](https://aws.amazon.com/blogs/compute/reducing-java-cold-starts-on-aws-lambda-functions-with-snapstart/) to improve startup performance.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.

authors.name: Mark Sailes
authors.bio: Mark is a specialist solutions architect working at AWS. His primary focus is improving the developer experience of builders using Java on AWS Lambda.
